vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for a Planned Development District for MU-1 Mixed Use District uses on property zoned an R-7.5(A) Single Family District with Specific Use Permit No. 184 for a private country club, on the northwest corner of South Lancaster Road and Crouch Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a conceptual plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Denial without prejudice
Z190-201(CT)
